parameters.name: AppImageConfigName
parameters.description: The name of the AppImageConfig to describe.

nested_items.name: AppImageConfigArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the AppImageConfig.

nested_items.name: AppImageConfigName
nested_items.description: The name of the AppImageConfig.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: When the AppImageConfig was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: When the AppImageConfig was last modified.

nested_items.name: KernelGatewayImageConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration of a KernelGateway app.

nested_items.name: KernelSpecs
nested_items.description: The specification of the Jupyter kernels in the image.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the Jupyter kernel in the image. This value is case sensitive.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the kernel.

nested_items.name: FileSystemConfig
nested_items.description: The Amazon Elastic File System storage configuration for a SageMaker AI image.

nested_items.name: MountPath
nested_items.description: The path within the image to mount the user's EFS home directory. The directory should be empty. If not specified, defaults to /home/sagemaker-user.

nested_items.name: DefaultUid
nested_items.description: The default POSIX user ID (UID). If not specified, defaults to 1000.

nested_items.name: DefaultGid
nested_items.description: The default POSIX group ID (GID). If not specified, defaults to 100.

nested_items.name: JupyterLabAppImageConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration of the JupyterLab app.

nested_items.name: DefaultUid
nested_items.description: The default POSIX user ID (UID). If not specified, defaults to 1000.

nested_items.name: DefaultGid
nested_items.description: The default POSIX group ID (GID). If not specified, defaults to 100.

nested_items.name: ContainerConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration used to run the application image container.

nested_items.name: ContainerArguments
nested_items.description: The arguments for the container when you're running the application.

nested_items.name: ContainerEntrypoint
nested_items.description: The entrypoint used to run the application in the container.
